goals.active: Search the bandit camps for Seraph prisoners.
goals.complete: We attacked the bandit camp and found the survivors of Falcon Company. I was reunited with my sister at last. I'm so glad to see her again! Though her ordeal was difficult, she'll be safe now in Divinity's Reach.
I've received a letter from the Royal Palace, requesting I come for an audience with the queen. I'd better make haste.
